Text.Page:
One of my old foes is in there.

Marineu, an argon iknephar, is leading Killian's argon contingent. We've fought him in Val Kaeliâ€”a wily, powerful opponent.

If you can corner him, kill him. I'll sleep better for it.

Excellent! This is a victory long in coming.

I wish I'd been the one to kill him, but no matter.
